seniority_level.evidence: Requires minimum 6 years of experience and mentions 'Data Platform Engineer' responsibilities with system design and architecture work

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on data pipelines, ETL processes, and data platform development

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions both 'real-time streaming data pipelines' and 'batch data processing' with Kafka for streaming and traditional ETL for batch

leadership_expectation.evidence: Focus on individual contributor work like building pipelines, implementing ETL processes, and coding - no mention of team leadership or direct reports

primary_cloud.evidence: AWS, Azure, and GCP are all listed as required skills with equal emphasis - no single cloud dominates

secondary_clouds.evidence: All three major cloud providers are explicitly mentioned as required skills

processing_paradigm.evidence: Job description explicitly mentions both 'real-time streaming data pipelines' and 'batch data processing' as separate requirements

orchestrator_category.evidence: Apache Airflow is explicitly listed as a required skill for data orchestration

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions both data warehouse solutions (BigQuery, Redshift) and data lake storage (S3, Blob Storage) with no clear primary focus

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Bengaluru, Karnataka, India with geo restriction to IN only

timezone_focus.evidence: Based in India (Bengaluru) which is in Asia-Pacific timezone region

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite requirement in specific location (Bengaluru) implies relocation needed for non-local candidates

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned, but this is an India-based position so H1B (US visa) not applicable

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support, position appears to require existing work authorization in India

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirements mentioned, appears to require only legal work authorization in India

w2_vs_1099.evidence: No contract type specified, but being an Accenture position suggests traditional employment rather than 1099 contracting

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, or other compensation details mentioned in the job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career progression, growth opportunities, or advancement paths mentioned in the job description

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship programs, working with senior staff, or learning opportunities mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career progression opportunities mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities within Accenture

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks, paths, or advancement opportunities mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between 'Must have skills' and 'Good to have skills' with specific technical requirements and 6+ years experience minimum

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description specifically on data engineering role with well-defined technical responsibilities and skill requirements

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skill requirements (6+ years, Databricks, cloud platforms, Spark) are appropriate for senior data engineer level
